DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare whether Symbicort Maintenance & Reliever Therapy ( SMART ) effective uncontrolled asthmatic patient current therapy real life situation .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Real Life Effectiveness Symbicort Maintenance Reliever Therapy Asthma Patients Across Asia
